name: Mage Chess
description:
Love chess and action games? Then this game is made for you! Mage Chess, a 3D chess game with humanoid chess pieces and super cool animations, renders epic medieval battles on the chessboard. It's simple to play: tap one of your soldiers and all the valid moves will show up for you to choose. And with the power of the free camera, you can observe the fights from any angle. Since the game uses ultra high-quality textures and antialiasing technology, it's really enjoyable to watch.

There are multiple game modes in Mage Chess: you can challenge the AI which has three difficulty levels. You can also play with friends sharing one device. It also provides an online mode where you can play against strangers using Game Center.
